Start with a tutorialÂ¶

In this section, you will find short tutorials on how to use the different components of the toolkt individually and longer complete tutorial to train and run a speaker verification system on standard tasks such as the RSR2015 database or the NIST Speaker Recognition Evaluation.

  • RSR2015
    • Prepare to run experiments on RSR2015
    • Run a GMM-UBM system
    • Run a SVM GMM system on the RSR2015 database
  • NIST-SRE 2010
    • Prepare to run experiments on NIST-SRE 2010
    • Run an i-vector system
  • NIST-SRE 2010 a DNN tutorial
    • Prepare to run experiments on NIST-SRE 2010 using bottleneck features
    • Train a Feed-Forward Deep Neural Network to extract bottleneck features
    • Run an i-vector system on bottleneck features
    • Prepare to run experiments on NIST-SRE 2010 using standard MFCC features
    • Run an i-vector system on MFCC features
    • How to concatenate MFCC and bottleneck features
    • Run an i-vector system on tandem features
